about_the_game:
Game introduction

This is a desktop pet, Can be placed on the computer desktop, Character's chest has a physical softening effect, Can add a layer of sexy to the desktop !
DLC unlocks everything !

Physical effect

Character's chest has a physical softening effect, Simulate real jitter

Take off clothing

The clothing of each part can be controlled individually, and the clothes of the specified part can be taken off

Game operation

Left mouse button can drag characters, Right mouse button to open function menu, Free transform

Game Features

A cute desktop pet

Contains 26 poses
Free movement position
Free rotation angle
Free scaling size

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains some naked and pornographic content, All characters are over 18 years old

name: Gift Girl - Expansion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4130
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or better
  • Storage: 120 MB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Turkish, Greek, Norwegian, Czech, Japanese, Polish, Thai, Swedish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Romanian, Finnish, Dutch, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
